definition: to contain/to hold/content/(of a poem etc) full of implicit meaning
to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity

sentences.english: The political significance of its poetic system forms a certain subtext.
sentences.chinese: 它的詩性體系中的政治含蘊構成了某種潛文本。
